column5: My plans fell through this morning so I decided to head down to the local creek.  I checked the water levels online and it showed extremely low...and with little rain in the past several days I wasn't hopeful for anything.  I was hoping for an early bow or brown....  I got to the pool and saw chinooks there.  I wasn't expecting a fresh run on them on a day like today!!  I decided to drift it anyways and I hooked into 7 fish!   It was crazy.  I only had a 4 lb floro leader so I broke most off early in the fight.  This one however I was able to control somewhat and after a 5 minute fight this one finally came in!    it sure was fun tussling with those bigguns!!
Nice!  Looks fresh!  Just curious, how far was this from the river mouth?  Thinking of trying some creeks in the west end of gta but not sure if they come that far up.
Thanks!  This wasn't close to the mouth at all.  Probably a kilometre away. That's why I was so surprised they were there.
ON THE PIN ???????????????   Nice fish Cliff. Grats dude.
Brian.  Not on the pin.  Used my 12' float rod, 6lb mainline and 4 lb leader.  Thought for sure I'd lose it. lol.
Well your plans might have fallen through but the fish gods sure came through for you! Steller day from the look of it!
you wont be to concerned about the game tonite, you already scored big time
nice fish......i think i know where you were though
nice fish......i think i know where you were though  I don't think that spot is much of a secret  Good job Cliff!!!!

Was going to photoshop that long blade of grass out, but was too lazy.  Lol.  If someone knows where that is from that picture then good for them.  I don't expect I've blown a honey hole or anything!  Thanks for the comments guys!
Just a dab of ketchup and that's got dinner for a couple of days covered Cliff! HH

Was going to photoshop that long blade of grass out, but was too lazy. Lol. If someone knows where that is from that picture then good for them. I don't expect I've blown a honey hole or anything!  Thanks for the comments guys!   haha not at all, i've always said if you can figure where someone was fishing from a tiny bit of background, then you've fished that spot many times yourself.  Its a nice pool to fish though!
